data.name: Before Sunset
data.detailed_description:
About The Game

A curse has been unleashed upon a village. You will play as Ah-Dan, who discovers a lead to the mystery and horrors of the curse, digging deeper into the disturbing truth about the dark side of the village. Never wander after sunset, for there are "things" creeping about, lurking in the shadows.

In The Game

  • Terrifying Antagonists
  • Story rich to get you entangled with.
  • Interesting and creepy puzzles around the entire game.
  • Animated Illustrations to disturb you further.
  • A very atmospheric environment that consists of day and night.
  • Additional side stories and hidden lore for you to dig around
  • An unlockable gallery.

From The Creator

Hi, I'm Justus Yew, the game creator of Before Sunset. Before Sunset is a game inspired by an old village me and my sister used to visit, the hometown of our grandparents.

I'm happy that our game is now up on the Steam store page, and over these months before launch there will be constant changes to improve and beautify this store page, as well as updates on the progress.

Me and my sister will be working side by side during the entire development of this game. We aim to create a story rich game that is engaging and full of mystery and twists to keep you at the edge of your seat. We will be incorporating more features such as animated illustrations, and we are really excited to see how it turns out. Do catch them in the game!

I will also be posting this game's development log videos that should be accessible through the community hub of this page. Thank you for your support!

data.short_description: Before Sunset is a 2D hand-drawn mystery and psychological horror game. Ah-Dan lives with his blind mother and also his pet dog in an old village. Since a very young age, Ah-Dan knows the rule of the village to always come home Before Sunset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
